Headline: Linden-bound Purple Line Service Delayed at Howard
ShortDescription: Linden-bound Purple Line trains are standing at Howard due to a single train delay. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Linden-bound Purple Line trains are standing at Howard due to a single train delay.

Shuttle buses have been requested from Howard to Linden to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
